snippet: The Taffera brothers, Robert and Eric, are the “it” contractors of Brooklyn Heights, having remade 40 brownstones there in the last few decades.
abstract: Contractors Robert and Eric Taffera have made business of catering to Brooklyn brownstone owners who prize patina of age combined with contemporary luxuries; brothers are known for bringing projects in on time and on budget.
lead_paragraph: The Taffera brothers, Robert and Eric, are the “it” contractors of Brooklyn Heights, having remade 40 brownstones there in the last few decades.

headline.main: The Curators of a Home’s ‘Brooklyn Look’
